Title: Cleopatra
Writer: Joseph L. Mankiewicz (screenplay), Ranald MacDougall (screenplay), Sidney Buchman (screenplay), Plutarch (histories), Suetonius (histories), Appian (histories), Carlo Maria Franzero (book)
Actors: Elizabeth Taylor, Richard Burton, Rex Harrison, Pamela Brown
Plot: Queen Cleopatra VII of Egypt experiences both triumph and tragedy as she attempts to resist the imperial ambitions of Rome.
